Description: The recruitment status of the study
allowed values: "Not yet recruiting", "Recruiting", "Enrolling by invitation", "Active, not recruiting", "Suspended", "Terminated", "Completed", "Withdrawn", "Unknown status"

Description: Flag for whether or not the study has expanded Access status
allowed values: "Available", "No longer available", "Temporarily not available", "Approved for marketing"

Description: The date that the status was verified. Equivalent to NCT's StatusVerifiedDate
The number of participants enrolled in the study
The type of estimation used to determine the enrollmentCount (actual counts, target size, etc.)
